update t_model_rule
type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seed_score = #{seedScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seed_img = #{seedImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ending_img = #{endingImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_model_rule set type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seed_score = #{seedScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seed_img = #{seedImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sprout_score = #{sproutScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sprout_img = #{sproutImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flower_score = #{flowerScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flower_img = #{flowerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ending_score = #{endingScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ending_img = #{endingImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(td.oid) from t_model_rule as td where 1=1
AND td.type_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}),'%')

select td.* from t_model_rule as td where 1=1
AND td.type_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}),'%')
order by td.oid desc
limit #{start},#{length}
select td.* from t_model_rule as td order by td.sort asc, td.oid desc
